channel.title: Lesson plans on Beaver Ambassadors
channel.description: Recent content in Lesson plans on Beaver Ambassadors

item.title: External Resources
item.description: NOAA (National Oceanic & Atmospheric Administration) is a leading federal environmental organization. NOAA has helped many other organizations, including zoos, aquariums and local jurisdictions, form educational material along with many lessons NOAA has developed in-house. Because NOAA is national they cover topics from Alaska to Hawaii to the Gulf of Mexico.
